name: Physics
description: Explore forces, energy, motion, and the fundamental laws of nature.

concepts.title: Newton's Laws
concepts.content: Understand motion through Newton's three laws.

concepts.title: Energy Conservation
concepts.content: Study how energy is transferred and conserved.

concepts.title: Waves
concepts.content: Learn about wave types and behaviors.

concepts.title: Electricity
concepts.content: Explore electric circuits and current flow.
